description:
One morning, Shuichi wakes up to discover a pimple on the tip of his nose.  After Maho tells him that there are many more to come, Shuichi tries desperately to get rid of the pimple, but more pop up...  After asking Anna for advice, he ends up talking with her about a number of other topics.  As Anna helps Shuichi, his negative impression of her blossoms into something different.  Meanwhile, Shuichi and Saori have been recruited by the drama club because of their script for the cultural festival genderbent play.
Source: crunchyroll
